```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Inserting Data

```{r}
df <- readRDS('FSB_BI_Survey_2019_2021.rds')
head(df)
```


## Creating a Clean Subset

```{r}
new_df <- subset(df, select = c(32:38))
new_df$survey_salary = df$survey_salary
head(new_df)
str(new_df)
```

Adding a column that has a 1 or 0 for "accepted fulltime job"
```{r}
new_df$fulltimejob <- ifelse(is.na(new_df$survey_plans == "accepted fulltime job", 1, 0))
head(new_df)
```

Turning survey_plans column into a factored column
```{r}
new_df$survey_plans_fact = as.factor(new_df$survey_plans)le
new_df$survey_plans_fact
```
